name: 2D Top Down Shooter Prototype
description:
work in progress

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

1, 2, 3 to switch guns

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

only works on pc

no player health as of right now. 

bullet damage is changed not by the type of bullet but instead by the current gun that is equiped. 

fast gun + switch to slow gun = big damage.

enemies are also immovable by the player.

only 16 enemies in total, one is a boss.

no sound.

only pew pew.
